title: Continuities of Deprivation: The Newcastle 1000 Family Study. By I. Kolvin, F. J. W. Miller, D. McI. Scott, S. R. M. Gatzanis and M. Fleeting. (Pp. 408; £38.50.) Avebury: Aldershot, Hants. 1990.
